participant_1.background:

i grew up in alabama.
my favorite jello is the blue one.
I'm a single dad, but I'm doing my best to raise my daughter right.
i saw a solar eclipse when i was 8 years old.

content.text: I'm a single dad raising my daughter, how about you?
I am an Army Ranger that loves to dye my hair bright colors!
Oh wow, that's intense! I've always wanted to see a solar eclipse.
I saw one when I was 8 years old, it was amazing!
Did you have to go somewhere special to see it?
No, it was here in Pittsburgh, but the city turned the lights off for a few minutes so we could see it better.
That's so cool! I'm originally from Alabama, but I live in Pittsburgh now. What's your favorite thing about Pittsburgh?
I love the history here. And the food!
I agree, the food is great! I've been trying to find the best pizza place in town.
I love pizza! And I love to cook. I'm really creative and I like to make new things.
You sound like a fun person! I'd love to get to know you better.
Me too! We should get together sometime and have lunch. We can bring our dogs and play some fetch.
That sounds perfect! I'll bring my camera so I can take pictures of us and our dogs.
Sounds like a plan! I'm looking forward to it
